name: RoadToLisa
description:
Tom is a prisoner, far away from his loving daughter, Lisa. 

He has to escape, but the prison hide a lot of  mysteries...

THE GAME

A creepy adventure, based on the "Escape Room" format, that will able to scare even your deepest fears.

Explore the prison

Solve the enigma

Escape from the prison

Developers

We are a team made up of two students of Politecnico di Torino, that has developed this game for the Virtual Reality course.

Jacopo Fiorenza - Writer and Programmer

Davide Marchetti - Art Designer

The Assets

All the models were made by us, except for a few objects taken from the Unity Asset Store.

Models

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/pbr-hospital-horror-pack-free-80117

Textures

https://3dtextures.me/

Warning: in this moment the only language available is Italian. The English version will be ready soon.
